summary.span: 表示下拉式方塊，用於控制項中。

span.span: Represents a combo box that is used in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖顯示的範例已經有影像和標籤，只具有映像，且只具有標籤的控制項。The following illustration shows examples of controls that have images and labels, that just have images, and that just have labels. ![功能區下拉式方塊控制項](~/add/media/wpfribbon-combobox.png "功能區下拉式方塊控制項")![Ribbon combo box controls](~/add/media/wpfribbon-combobox.png "Ribbon combo box controls") 功能區下拉式方塊控制項Ribbon combo box controls 下圖顯示下拉式清單開啟時。The following illustration shows a when the drop-down is opened. ![功能區下拉式方塊控制項拖放-下開放](~/add/media/wpfribbon-combobox-selection.png "功能區下拉式清單開啟的下拉式方塊控制項")![Ribbon combo box control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-combobox-selection.png "Ribbon combo box control with drop-down open") 開啟下拉式功能表的功能區下拉式方塊控制項Ribbon combo box control with drop-down open ## Examples 下列範例顯示使用三個可用的項目建立下拉式方塊的標記。The following example shows the markup to create a combo box with three available items. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonComboBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribboncombobox)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否啟用僅顯示選取項目模式，使用者在此模式中只能選取下拉式方塊的內容，但無法編輯。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether selection-only mode is enabled, in which the contents of the combo box are selectable but not editable.

value.span: 已註冊的預設值是 。
